title: turn chromas off option?
body: i dont want to play against a purple zed one came then an orange zed the next game it is hard for some peoples eyes and i dont want to turn my moniter to gray. I just want to see the white shockblade not some purple one...

replies.body:
Hey RainingLegend,

At this time, we don't have plans to make chromas (like skins) a toggle that can be turned on and off per player.

When creating chromas, we are careful about the color selection, and gameplay does take a look at the new content before it goes live.
